headline: CAT Q4 Deep Dive: Order Momentum Drives Record Backlog Amid Tariff Pressures
summary: Construction equipment company Caterpillar (NYSE:CAT) reported Q4 CY2025 results exceeding the market’s revenue expectations, with sales up 18% year on year to $19.13 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $5.16 per share was 9.5% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Caterpillar Q4 Earnings Call Highlights
summary: Caterpillar (NYSE:CAT) reported record results for both the fourth quarter and full year 2025, with executives emphasizing strong demand across end markets, a sharply higher backlog, and ongoing pressure from tariffs that the company expects to intensify in 2026.
